circle.style: stroke: black; stroke-width: 2px; fill: white; fill-opacity: 0.95;

text.style: font-family: Arial, sans-serif; font-size: 11px; font-weight: normal; fill: black;
text.tspan: Derivatives master
to be created

rect.style: stroke: black; stroke-width: 2px; fill: white; fill-opacity: 0.95;

text.style: font-family: Arial, sans-serif; font-size: 12px; font-weight: normal; fill: black;
text.tspan: Create derivatives
master

rect.style: stroke: black; stroke-width: 2px; fill: white; fill-opacity: 0.95;

text.style: font-family: Arial, sans-serif; font-size: 12px; font-weight: normal; fill: black;
text.tspan: Generate derivatives
master

circle.style: stroke: black; stroke-width: 4px; fill: white; fill-opacity: 0.95;

text.style: font-family: Arial, sans-serif; font-size: 11px; font-weight: normal; fill: black;
text.tspan: Derivatives master
created

text.style: font-family: Arial, sans-serif; font-size: 12px; font-weight: normal; fill: black;
text.tspan: - Future, Stock or Option contracts can be defined
- Basic contract details (type of derivative, exchange, currency, delivery method)
- Pricing data
- Trading size
- For FXOTC options Single Generic Contract Master to be created
- Contract class with contract type FXOTC
- Fields Currency, Delivery Currency, Price Dps, Tick Size, Tick Value,
Min Price Mvmt and Underlying will be defaulted
- Loss margin rate can be define to calculate Margin value for Negative positions
- System can be parameterised to suppress generation of underlying trades
- Definition of multiple exotic events supported
- Possible to trigger Exercise/ Expiry of an exotic event

polyline.style: fill: none; stroke: black; stroke-width: 2px; stroke-dasharray: 0.5, 5; stroke-linecap: round; stroke-linejoin: round;
